articles.title: Stocks to Watch Tuesday Recap: Novo Nordisk, Huntington Ingalls, ServiceNow
articles.mainIdea: Stocks to Watch Tuesday Recap: Novo Nordisk, Huntington Ingalls, ServiceNow
articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal: Stocks to Watch Tuesday Recap: Novo Nordisk, Huntington Ingalls, ServiceNow. ↗️ Novo Nordisk (NVO): The Danish drugmaker will start selling a pill version of its Wegovy weight-loss medicine in January, after securing approval from U.S. regulators. Novo Nordisk's stock jumped and its U. Related tickers mentioned: DNNGY, DOGEF, HII, LMT, NOC, NONOF, NOW, NVO.

articles.title: RTX awarded $841.68M Army contract
articles.summary: TipRanks: RTX awarded $841.68M Army contract. RTX (RTX) was awarded an $841.68M fixed-price-incentive contract for fire units to include new production hardware, software, services inherent to production, spares and documentation. The modification brings the total cumulative face value of the contract to $1.72B. Work will be performed in Andover, Massachusetts, with an estimated completion date of June 30, 2031. Fiscal 2026 Foreign Military Sales funds in the amount of $841.68M were obligated at the time of the award. Army Contracting Comma

articles.title: Trump calls out defense contractors, gold & silver extend gains
articles.mainIdea: Trump calls out defense contractors, gold & silver extend gains
articles.summary: Yahoo Finance Video: Trump calls out defense contractors, gold & silver extend gains. Yahoo Finance's J.R. Whalen tracks Tuesday's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including Huntington Ingalls Industries (HII); defense contractors like Northrop Grumman (NOC), RTX (RTX), and Lockheed Martin (LMT); and gold (GC=F) and silver (SI=F) rising. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute. Related tickers mentioned: HII, LMT, NOC.
